definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]

pinyin: Xin1 xi1 bo2 li4 ya4 shi4

sentences.english: I have long heard about the Science City of Novosibirsk.
sentences.chinese: 久聞新西伯利亞有座科學城。

sentences.english: The so-called October Bridge connects two areas in Novosibirsk.
sentences.chinese: 這就是新西伯利亞地區連接兩地十月大橋。

sentences.english: This stack is the highest construction in Novosibirsk.
sentences.chinese: 這是新西伯利亞最高的建築羣。
